org.tap4j.model

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tap4j.model.TapElement
      • org.tap4j.model.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Comment
extends TapElement
    A TAP Comment. In TAP files the comments have a # before the text.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
